mapper.select: Select * From ( Select rownum rnum, a.* From ( Select jspuser.* From jspuser Order by userId) a) Where rnum Between #{page}*#{pageSize}-(#{pageSize}-1) And #{page}*#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: Insert Into jspuser (userId, name, pass, addr1, addr2, zip, birth, email, tel, profile) Values(#{userId}, #{name}, #{pass}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zip}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{profile, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
